description: JoshJosh is another favorite on Active Duty LIVE that was introduced to me by Thomas. Josh is 6'3' and weighs 215 lbs., he likes playing guitar and working out. This guy is quite the character and a lot of fun to work with. Josh and I have become really good friends since this solo and he's come a long way. He really shines through in Fire In the Hole 2 with Thomas, Elijah and Damien, but we get Josh all to ourselves today. It's nice to see how these guys react their first time in front of the camera, but once Josh pulls out that huge, hard cock of his you'll probably forget everything he said five minutes earlier. What a cock to behold on this guy. He's absolutely beautiful all over and he doesn't mind giving you a front row seat to all his goods. His two-handed stroking action is worth the price of admission, but once he blows his huge load you'll be in heaven.
title: Josh
